title: New York Police Officer Killed in Harlem Shooting; Second Officer Seriously Wounded
sub_head: With four officers shot in the city in as many days, Mayor Adams calls for federal authorities to do more to round up stolen guns
body:
A New York City police officer was killed and another critically wounded Friday night while answering a call about an argument between a woman and her adult son, officials said, making four officers shot in the city in as many days.
Just three weeks into their jobs, Mayor Eric Adams—a former police captain himself—and Police Commissioner Keechant Sewell stood before the media at a Harlem hospital, denouncing the spate of violence against the New York Police Department.
